reviews.text: I stayed in a superior 1 bed apartment for 3 nights on a business trip and was not very pleased, it was barely ok but I would prefer a hotel room for the same price.
reviews.title: Doorbell rang several times per night, will not return

reviews.text: Positive:
reviews.title: Re-think before you book "Think"

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: +The apartment looks nice and feels modern
reviews.title: A different way to stay

reviews.text: +The location was pretty good with stores and restaurants close by, the tube is a 15-minute walk.
reviews.title: Dificult to get anything done

reviews.text: +My apartment offered nice views.
reviews.title: Not central, overpriced, and a dump. Do not stay here.

reviews.text: Having previously enjoyed stays at Think Bermondsey and Think Earls Court on business I thought that it would be a great idea to stay at another Think – this time Tower Bridge, when I went away with my wife and some friends for the weekend. How wrong I was. The quality in comparison to the other Thinks is shocking, poor state of repair and decoration, beds were sub standard, scratched and damaged work surfaces and furniture. We had an old tube style TV in the corner of the lounge area with a cacophony of wires poking out of the back, connected to the mains with a block adaptor which is not good practice.
reviews.title: Not anywhere near as good as the other Think Appartments!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: But worst of all the building creaks – don’t ask me how or why but as a consequence there is a constant noise which prevented me from having any kind of sleep. Plus if you like sleeping with the window open – forget it! The blinds on the window (unlike curtains which they have at the other sites) flap constantly in the wind like some sort of demented wind chime.
reviews.title: Make sure not to get room 323

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: In short if you think the Thinks are all the same then think again!
reviews.title: Great stay in one of the best locations.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We woke up in the middle of the night with noise of water running through the walls very loudly. When contacting the desk they said is was a known problem and that we would get another room. We did. Why would they out us in a room with known defects when good rooms were availlable? Out of 2 night at Think 1 was very [..]. Not a good score.
reviews.title: Much better than a hotel

reviews.text: All the rest was OK
reviews.title: Superb room quality and in room service!

reviews.text: We spent New Year down in London first of all fanastic price when you look at what other places were asking, we had a studio apartment it had everything you needed and things we did not need, very clean and smart and this includes the outside area's.
reviews.title: FANTASTIC APARTMENTS GREAT LOCATION AND PRICE

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is about a 10 minute walk(this is because we had never been here before) from London Bridge Tube Station.
reviews.title: Very peaceful, would stay again.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A small mini market is about 200 yds from the apartments selling everything you would need.
reviews.title: a comfortable apartment

reviews.text: Tower Bridge is a 5 minute walk in the opposite direction of London Bridge Tube, just off the bridge to the right on the Tower of London side take a look around ST Katherines Dock great Resteraunts and a very large pub and plenty of large boats/yachts a nice thing to see.
reviews.title: Great value for money.

reviews.text: I have just come back from here and would firstly say that the location is brilliant and easy to locate just10 minutes from the london bridge station. The staff were helpful and the service was quick, they also gave us a small list of directions to get to our apartment block. We stayed in a superior studio apartment for 2 nights over new years (had a view of the london eye!) and were very suprised at the size, it was really big, clean, modern and felt homely, sofas were a little worn but it suited our stay perfectly. I had read from other reviews that it is quite noisy but i found it really quiet, no noise at all, but i suppose it depends on which room you stay in. Overall was the perfect apartment for the short break away, would definitely go back and would reccommend it to anyone!
reviews.title: Cheap, helpful staff, big room, good location, but a bit worn

reviews.text: Spent ten days nine nights early December 2011 ... got a one bedroom suite ... Hassan, the Manager on duty grabbed half a dozen keys and showed us all one bedroom suits he had until we picked the one we liked!!!
reviews.title: Nice and Clean ... Great Service

reviews.text: Everything was great, everything worked fine, we would go there again.
reviews.title: A fine stay

reviews.text: Only drawback: you walk 15 minutes to the nearest tube station.
